channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiOS, FortiProxy

item.title: CVE-2022-29055|2024-08-03T06:10:59.155Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortios%2C%20fortiproxy
item.description: A access of uninitialized pointer in Fortinet FortiOS version 7.2.0, 7.0.0 through 7.0.5, 6.4.0 through 6.4.8, 6.2.0 through 6.2.10, 6.0.x, FortiProxy version 7.0.0 through 7.0.4, 2.0.0 through 2.0.9, 1.2.x allows a remote unauthenticated or authenticated attacker to crash the sslvpn daemon via an HTTP GET request.
